newsitem.title: USA: Acacia Research restates Q1 results.
newsitem.headline: Acacia Research restates Q1 results.

text.p: Acacia Research Corp has restated its first quarter earnings to a loss of $0.50 a share from a previously reported loss of $0.38 a share to meet generally accepted accounting rules for options and warrants.

In a statement issued Friday, Acacia said it had reported the weighted average number of shares outstanding at about 2.6 million, including stock warrants and options. But it has now excluded warrants and options, reducing the shares outstanding to just over 2.0 million and boosting the loss per share.
The 1997 first quarter loss included a legal settlement charge that now amounts to a $0.23 a share, rather than the previously reported $0.17 per share.
Acacia reported a net loss of just over $1.0 million for the quarter March 31, versus a loss of $879,790 one year ago.
